issue.message: By convention, the custom view (`ButtonPill`) and the declare-styleable (`Button`) should have the same name (various editor features rely on this convention)
By convention, the custom view (`ButtonPill`) and the declare-styleable (`Button`) should have the same name (various editor features rely on this convention)
